title: Bugsplats, Connection Error.
body: Hey is there any fixes i have been dealing with this Bugsplat problem, is there any possible way to fix this? I mean its getting annoying every time a lot of Bugsplats lots! and also if i don't get Bugsplats i rather get a Connection Error even tho i have a good Connection.

replies.body: What exactly is going on when you get these bugsplats? Are you simply idling on the client or in champion select? Do these happen in the middle of games or are you only being disconnected in games?
After champion select i just get a random bugsplat out of no where.
